profile.rationale: The role involves a significant balance between core software engineering tasks (1.A.1 - development, integration, infrastructure, API exposure) and GenAI specialization tasks (1.B.1 - designing/implementing LLM solutions, overseeing AI lifecycle, training LLMs). The emphasis on LLMs and AI-driven solutions, combined with leadership responsibilities, points towards a Core GenAI Engineer profile.

confidence.reasoning: The job advertisement is very clear and detailed, explicitly mentioning responsibilities related to both software engineering and specific GenAI tasks like LLM development and integration. The tasks align well with the defined profiles, making the assignment straightforward.
